actions.committee: House Committee on Banking and Currency
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking and Currency.

official_title: A bill to assure that Federal housing assistance programs are carried out to the full extent authorized by Congress.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of Housing and Urban Development to immediately cease any suspension of Federal housing assistance programs. Directs that Federal housing assistance programs shall be carried out to the full extent authorized by Congress. Directs the Secretary not to withhold or delay any application approvals for such programs.

titles.title: A bill to assure that Federal housing assistance programs are carried out to the full extent authorized by Congress.
